blogs.title: Paul Young on SPLIT, HEAT and Platform Trials
blogs.summary:
An interview with Paul Young discussing the SPLIT trial, the HEAT trial & how Platform Trials will save the world. Paul is certainly the man of the moment.
The post Paul Young on SPLIT, HEAT and Platform Trials appeared first on Intensive Care Network.
